function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Policy responses to the covid-19 pandemic influencing the pace of sustainable energy transitions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex sociotechnical processes of decarbonisation within energy systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequity and energy poverty","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Political approaches to crisis","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Short-term survival strategies supporting business-as-usual","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in global co2 emissions due to pandemic-related changes in social practices and energy changes","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mobility sharing with bicycles and electric car sharing","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity
